title: PLAY BALL: Bored Ape Yacht Club Members Can Attend The MLB's Virtual Ballpark As Their Bored Ape PFP Tonight!
description: Apes, grab your peanuts and crackerjacks because Yuga Labs’ Otherside partner, ImprobableIo, is taking Web3 to a whole new ballgame in the metaverse tonight—and you’re invited to attend as your 3D-modeled Bored Ape!Things are anything but boring around the swamp this evening, as Yuga Labs has invited BAYC members not only to attend tonight’s Tampa Bay Devil Rays vs. Detroit Tigers game in the MLB Virtual Ballpark, but to go as their Bored Ape PFPs!“We're running a last minute test with @Improbab
